argument.description: An expression that returns a value of one of the following built-in data types: a DATE or a TIMESTAMP.

description: The TRUNC_TIMESTAMP scalar function returns a TIMESTAMP that is an argument (expression) truncated to the unit specified by another argument (format-string).
